headline: Does Martin Marietta’s Recent 20.8% Surge Still Justify Its Premium Price in 2025?
summary: Thinking about whether you should buy, hold, or trim your position in Martin Marietta Materials? You're not alone. Plenty of investors are weighing their next move after a steady stretch for this construction aggregates leader. Shares are up an impressive 20.8% this year, with a strong five-year run of 130.6%. In the last week, however, the stock dipped 2.4%. This mix of short-term volatility and long-term growth has caught a lot of eyes. Behind these numbers, the company has attracted...
